attributes.action: Apply same government Energy Price Policy on Bank Interest Received rates.
attributes.additional_details:
POLICY
Apply same legally requirement as government Energy Price Policy on Bank Interest Received rates.

DETAIL
Make it impossible for Banks to pay unfair rates. Customers to always get best Bank Interest Receivable rate and ban the 12 month period trap (.05% / .005% typical) both People and Businesses.

AIM
Bring back old deposit style account with a guaranteed fair Interest rate received. Rather than allowing Banks to continue to rip off customers and give themseleves unfair bonuses because customers do not have the time to keep track of everything in their lifes today.
